resources.string:
Hey! I am Expandable

 -Sagarpreet Chadha 
 Delhi Technological University

Hey! How to use me ? 

 Use the Floating Button to make a Reminder or a QuickNote . 

 Pink Float Button lets you add a Reminder . 
SWIPE Right ON a reminder to Delete it !!
 

 Blue Float Button lets You add a Quck Note . 
Click on the Title to expand it (To See Description) and Long Click ON the LIST-TITLE to delete it .


BYE 

 https://github.com/sagarpreet-chadha/memor 

 -Sagarpreet Chadha 
 Delhi Technological University
